configurations.name: Try ConsoleBox
configurations.command: rm -rf MyConsole;dotnet new consolebox --linux -n MyConsole;cd MyConsole/src;dotnet run --project MyConsole

configurations.name: Try ConsoleBox Project
configurations.command: rm -rf MyConsole;dotnet new consoleprj --linux -n MyConsole;cd MyConsole;dotnet run

configurations.name: Try WebApiBox
configurations.command: rm -rf MyWebApi;dotnet new webapibox -n MyWebApi;cd MyWebApi/src;dotnet run MyWebApi --project MyWebApi
